author: perrotta
body:
Just a couple of small adjustment to our latest pull request:
- Also the frozen menu is migrated to CMSSW_7_1_8 ConfDB template (just forgot in the previous #5226)
- A prescale factor of 50 is given to a couple of di-muon paths

Both fixes change nothing to the current workflows
title: Fine tune adjustments to run2 menu
